question:
A friend has offered you some work in his company. You are
currently employed and not able to start for three months.
Write a reply to your friend. In your letter:
give details of what you know about his company
explain your current situation
give your answer to the offer and explain why
text: Thank you so much for offering the position of Software Engineer in your prestigious company ABC Infotech Pvt Ltd, Mumbai. At the same time, I’m sorry to inform you that I can’t join you any time before the next three months.

I’m aware of the tremendous growth your firm has achieved in consultancy services over the past 5 years. The company has built a reputation with many multi-national clients, expanding its offices in more than 15 countries.

As you already know, I’m currently working with an IT Tech company in Delhi, I have to comply with their strict notice period of two months on resigning. Also, my son and daughter are studying here in Delhi, I can only relocate to your city after their semester exams are over.

Though, I’ll be very happy to accept your offer,  could you please check with your manager if my onboarding can be postponed? I promise I’ll join your company after three months which is on 2 May 2022.
I hope you’ll understand my situation.
